meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rhea Levine Joseph D'Hippolito Walter Mayes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1707.

td.p: Rhea Levine, an anatomy professor from Haddonfield, New Jersey
Joseph D'Hippolito, a freelance writer from Fullerton, California
Walter Mayes, a publisher sales representative from San Francisco, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $56,003)

tr.td: HISTORIC SITES
ODD JOBS
SPORTS
THE SEAS
INTERNATIONAL CUISINE
STARTS WITH "K"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_5', 'clue_DJ_1_5_stuck', '(Alex: Joseph, it seems to be your day.)
[Laughter]
(Joseph: $8,000!)
(Alex: All right.)
(Joseph: No, wait a sec...uh...)
(Alex: No, you can\'t change your mind, I\'m sorry. You\'re stuck with that. You\'ll still be in the lead if you\'re wrong. I hope for your sake that you are right.)
(Joseph: I hope for my sake too.)
[Laughter]
...
(Alex: You have $20,000!)
[Screams and cheers from the audience]
(Joseph: [Fist pumps] Wooo! [Hand slaps the podium])
(Alex: Joseph, before you make your next selection let me ask you a question because when I read that clue I got the feeling you were going to ring in again when though you didn\'t have to. Am I right or wrong?)
(Joseph: No, I\'m just a very tense person.)
[The end-of-round signal sounds.]

sisters

Joseph
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
